nodes.text: Martial Arts is an article written by August Hahn and Cynthia Hahn as a tie in to the Living Force campaign. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on April 15, 2004 and took the form of a short story in which Barnab Chistor, the governor of Cularin personally greets the Five Masters on their arrival to the planet, and accompanies them to the site of their Temple. There, he is surprised to discover he has been chosen to be their first apprentice.
